passage_text: If you are in doubt as to how to repair a garage door, by all means call a pro. Garage doors are heavy and the springs are highly tensioned, and you do not want to risk an injury to yourself or others.

There are two main components to a garage door: the door itself and the opener. In this article, we'll tell you how to make repairs to both things. We'll start with the actual door. Overhead garage doors, whether they roll up in sections or swing up in one piece, operate on spring tension. The door moves on metal tracks on the garage walls, and a heavy spring or springs provide the power. Swing-up garage doors move on horizontal tracks.
